dataList.content: During the event, having the listed Identities and E.G.O on your team <color=#f8c200>increases the amount of [Bongy Plushies] earned</color>.

Event Identities and E.G.O on the team
boost the amnt. of [Bongy Plushies] earned.
※ Please rest assured that all meat used at Eunbong’s is not derived from K Corp’s Singularity.
All this stuff up for grabs?! The owner’s gone cuckoo!!!

Clear Hell’s Chicken Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Dungeons to earn <color=#990000>[Bongy Plushies]</color>.

You can redeem various rewards from the <color=#990000>[Coupon Trade-in]</color> based on the number of <color=#990000>[Bongy Plushies]</color> you have.
Load the saved Identities and E.G.O from the preset?
※ The list of Identities and E.G.O you used is automatically saved in the preset, which can be loaded upon reentry.

If you forfeit, the Enkephalin Modules spent for entry will be refunded.
